original_text: But to the king of Judah which sent you to enquire of the Lord, thus shall ye say to him, Thus saith the Lord God of Israel, As touching the words which thou hast heard;
korean_text: 너희를 보내 여호와께 묻게 한 유다 왕에게는 너희가 이렇게 말하라 이스라엘의 하나님 여호와가 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 네가 들은 말들에 대하여는

sentences.original_text: But to the king of Judah
which sent you to enquire of the Lord,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희를 보내여 여호와께 물어보게 한 그 왕에게

sentences.original_text: thus shall ye say to him,
Thus saith the Lord God of Israel,
